snippet: GOV. JOHNSON AND FREE BANKING.--The Philadelphia Ledger, a neutral and therefore Democratic paper, comments, in its money article, yesterday, on the New-York system of Free Banks, and concludes: "It is such a law as this some persons in Pennsylvan...
lead_paragraph: GOV. JOHNSON AND FREE BANKING.--The Philadelphia Ledger, a neutral and therefore Democratic paper, comments, in its money article, yesterday, on the New-York system of Free Banks, and concludes: "It is such a law as this some persons in Pennsylvania, Gov. Johnston among the number, want adopted here. The Ledger has ever opposed it, and all experience tends to confirm the propriety of its opposition."
